name: OpenNewsletter
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Open source mailing list manager with builds from Self Exile, NetMeans.Net and Quadro.Net

matches.text: This is a Free & Open Source mailing list manager developed by Self Exile and distributed under the GPL.
This is a Free & Open Source mailing list manager developed by Self Exile and distributed under the GPL.
This is a Free & Open Source mailing list manager developed by NetMeans.Net and distributed under the LGPL license. This software is based on the OpenNewsletter project by Self Exile.

This is a Free & Open Source mailing list manager developed by Quadro Net and distributed under the LGPL license. This software is based on the OpenNewsletter project by Self Exile and NmnNewsletter by NetMeans.Net.
